panels.name: SPF Failure by OrgName
SPF Failures by Org per Day
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="<srccat>"
| parse xml "/record/report_metadata/org_name/text()" as org_name nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/source_ip/text()" as source_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/policy_evaluated/disposition/text()" as disposition_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/policy_evaluated/dkim/text()" as dkim_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/policy_evaluated/spf/text()" as spf_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/identifiers/header_from/text()" as header_from nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/dkim/domain/text()" as dkim_domain nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/dkim/result/text()" as dkim_domain_result nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/spf/domain/text()" as spf_domain nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/spf/result/text()" as spf_domain_result nodrop
| where spf_ip="fail" //and !(org_name="google.com")
| timeslice 1d
| count _timeslice, org_name  | order by _count
| transpose row _timeslice column org_name

panels.name: SPF Failures by Source
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="<srccat>"
| parse xml "/record/report_metadata/org_name/text()" as org_name nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/source_ip/text()" as source_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/policy_evaluated/disposition/text()" as disposition_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/policy_evaluated/dkim/text()" as dkim_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/policy_evaluated/spf/text()" as spf_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/identifiers/header_from/text()" as header_from nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/dkim/domain/text()" as dkim_domain nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/dkim/result/text()" as dkim_domain_result nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/spf/domain/text()" as spf_domain nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/spf/result/text()" as spf_domain_result nodrop
| where spf_ip="fail" //and !(org_name="google.com")
//| timeslice 1d
| count header_from, spf_domain, spf_ip, spf_domain_result, source_ip //,_timeslice
| order by _count
//| transpose row _timeslice column header_from

panels.name: SPF Failures by Header From
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="<srccat>"
| parse xml "/record/report_metadata/org_name/text()" as org_name nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/source_ip/text()" as source_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/policy_evaluated/disposition/text()" as disposition_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/policy_evaluated/dkim/text()" as dkim_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/policy_evaluated/spf/text()" as spf_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/identifiers/header_from/text()" as header_from nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/dkim/domain/text()" as dkim_domain nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/dkim/result/text()" as dkim_domain_result nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/spf/domain/text()" as spf_domain nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/spf/result/text()" as spf_domain_result nodrop
| where spf_ip="fail" //and !(org_name="google.com")
//| timeslice 1d
| count header_from //,org_name, source_ip 
| order by _count
//| transpose row _timeslice column org_name

panels.name: SPF Failures by From per Day
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="<srccat>"
| parse xml "/record/report_metadata/org_name/text()" as org_name nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/source_ip/text()" as source_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/policy_evaluated/disposition/text()" as disposition_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/policy_evaluated/dkim/text()" as dkim_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/policy_evaluated/spf/text()" as spf_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/identifiers/header_from/text()" as header_from nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/dkim/domain/text()" as dkim_domain nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/dkim/result/text()" as dkim_domain_result nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/spf/domain/text()" as spf_domain nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/spf/result/text()" as spf_domain_result nodrop
| where spf_ip="fail" //and !(org_name="google.com")
| timeslice 1d
| count _timeslice, header_from //,org_name, source_ip 
| order by _count
| transpose row _timeslice column header_from

panels.name: Failure By Country
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="<srccat>"
| parse xml "/record/report_metadata/org_name/text()" as org_name nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/source_ip/text()" as source_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/policy_evaluated/disposition/text()" as disposition_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/policy_evaluated/dkim/text()" as dkim_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/policy_evaluated/spf/text()" as spf_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/identifiers/header_from/text()" as header_from nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/dkim/domain/text()" as dkim_domain nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/dkim/result/text()" as dkim_domain_result nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/spf/domain/text()" as spf_domain nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/spf/result/text()" as spf_domain_result nodrop
| where spf_ip="fail" //and !(org_name="google.com")
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_name, region, country_cf from geo://location on ip=source_ip
//| timeslice 1d
| count country_name //,header_from, dkim_domain, source_ip //,_timeslice
| order by _count
//| transpose row _timeslice column header_from

panels.name: SPF Failures by Location
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="<srccat>"
| parse xml "/record/report_metadata/org_name/text()" as org_name nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/source_ip/text()" as source_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/policy_evaluated/disposition/text()" as disposition_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/policy_evaluated/dkim/text()" as dkim_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/policy_evaluated/spf/text()" as spf_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/identifiers/header_from/text()" as header_from nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/dkim/domain/text()" as dkim_domain nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/dkim/result/text()" as dkim_domain_result nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/spf/domain/text()" as spf_domain nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/spf/result/text()" as spf_domain_result nodrop
| where spf_ip="fail" //and !(org_name="google.com")
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_name, region, country_cf from geo://location on ip=source_ip
//| timeslice 1d
| count latitude, longitude //,header_from, dkim_domain, source_ip //,_timeslice
| order by _count
//| transpose row _timeslice column header_from

panels.name: Filtered SPF Failure by OrgName
Filtered SPF Failures by Org per Day
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="<srccat>"
| parse xml "/record/report_metadata/org_name/text()" as org_name nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/source_ip/text()" as source_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/policy_evaluated/disposition/text()" as disposition_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/policy_evaluated/dkim/text()" as dkim_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/policy_evaluated/spf/text()" as spf_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/identifiers/header_from/text()" as header_from nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/dkim/domain/text()" as dkim_domain nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/dkim/result/text()" as dkim_domain_result nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/spf/domain/text()" as spf_domain nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/spf/result/text()" as spf_domain_result nodrop
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_name, region, country_cf from geo://location on ip=source_ip
| where !(country_name in ("Russian Federation","Viet Nam","Netherlands","China","Turkey","Singapore","Indonesia","India","Brazil","Iran","Czech Republic","Thailand","Korea (south)","Taiwan","Ukraine","Hong Kong","Chile","Hungary","Malaysia","Argentina","Colombia","Slovak Republic","Portugal","Latvia","Bangladesh","Philippines","Lithuania","Bulgaria","Estonia","Israel","Bosnia And Herzegovina","Liechtenstein","Serbia","South Africa","Kazakhstan","Pakistan","Slovenia","Panama","Greece","Tunisia","Kyrgyzstan","New Zealand","Mongolia","Uzbekistan","Iceland","United Arab Emirates","Nigeria","Mali","Venezuela","Costa Rica","Belarus","Croatia","Bhutan","Moldova","Morocco","El Salvador","Peru","Niger","Belize","Laos","Azerbaijan","Madagascar","Uganda","Nepal","Cambodia","Macedonia","Armenia","Egypt","Iraq","Mauritius","Qatar","Fiji","Georgia","Dominican Republic","Mozambique","Bahamas","Kenya","New Caledonia","Myanmar","Algeria","Malta","Uruguay","Cyprus","Guadeloupe"))
| where spf_ip="fail" //and !(org_name="google.com")
| timeslice 1d
| count _timeslice, org_name  | order by _count
| transpose row _timeslice column org_name

panels.name: Filtered SPF Failures by Source
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="<srccat>"
| parse xml "/record/report_metadata/org_name/text()" as org_name nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/source_ip/text()" as source_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/policy_evaluated/disposition/text()" as disposition_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/policy_evaluated/dkim/text()" as dkim_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/policy_evaluated/spf/text()" as spf_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/identifiers/header_from/text()" as header_from nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/dkim/domain/text()" as dkim_domain nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/dkim/result/text()" as dkim_domain_result nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/spf/domain/text()" as spf_domain nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/spf/result/text()" as spf_domain_result nodrop
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_name, region, country_cf from geo://location on ip=source_ip
| where !(country_name in ("Russian Federation","Viet Nam","Netherlands","China","Turkey","Singapore","Indonesia","India","Brazil","Iran","Czech Republic","Thailand","Korea (south)","Taiwan","Ukraine","Hong Kong","Chile","Hungary","Malaysia","Argentina","Colombia","Slovak Republic","Portugal","Latvia","Bangladesh","Philippines","Lithuania","Bulgaria","Estonia","Israel","Bosnia And Herzegovina","Liechtenstein","Serbia","South Africa","Kazakhstan","Pakistan","Slovenia","Panama","Greece","Tunisia","Kyrgyzstan","New Zealand","Mongolia","Uzbekistan","Iceland","United Arab Emirates","Nigeria","Mali","Venezuela","Costa Rica","Belarus","Croatia","Bhutan","Moldova","Morocco","El Salvador","Peru","Niger","Belize","Laos","Azerbaijan","Madagascar","Uganda","Nepal","Cambodia","Macedonia","Armenia","Egypt","Iraq","Mauritius","Qatar","Fiji","Georgia","Dominican Republic","Mozambique","Bahamas","Kenya","New Caledonia","Myanmar","Algeria","Malta","Uruguay","Cyprus","Guadeloupe"))
| where spf_ip="fail" //and !(org_name="google.com")
//| timeslice 1d
| count source_ip, header_from, spf_domain, spf_ip, spf_domain_result //,_timeslice
| order by _count
//| transpose row _timeslice column header_from

_sourceCategory="<srccat>"

| parse xml "/record/report_metadata/org_name/text()" as org_name nodrop

panels.name: Filtered Failure By Country
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="<srccat>"
| parse xml "/record/report_metadata/org_name/text()" as org_name nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/source_ip/text()" as source_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/policy_evaluated/disposition/text()" as disposition_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/policy_evaluated/dkim/text()" as dkim_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/policy_evaluated/spf/text()" as spf_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/identifiers/header_from/text()" as header_from nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/dkim/domain/text()" as dkim_domain nodrop

| parse xml "/record/auth_results/spf/domain/text()" as spf_domain nodrop

| where !(country_name in ("Russian Federation","Viet Nam","Netherlands","China","Turkey","Singapore","Indonesia","India","Brazil","Iran","Czech Republic","Thailand","Korea (south)","Taiwan","Ukraine","Hong Kong","Chile","Hungary","Malaysia","Argentina","Colombia","Slovak Republic","Portugal","Latvia","Bangladesh","Philippines","Lithuania","Bulgaria","Estonia","Israel","Bosnia And Herzegovina","Liechtenstein","Serbia","South Africa","Kazakhstan","Pakistan","Slovenia","Panama","Greece","Tunisia","Kyrgyzstan","New Zealand","Mongolia","Uzbekistan","Iceland","United Arab Emirates","Nigeria","Mali","Venezuela","Costa Rica","Belarus","Croatia","Bhutan","Moldova","Morocco","El Salvador","Peru","Niger","Belize","Laos","Azerbaijan","Madagascar","Uganda","Nepal","Cambodia","Macedonia","Armenia","Egypt","Iraq","Mauritius","Qatar","Fiji","Georgia","Dominican Republic","Mozambique","Bahamas","Kenya","New Caledonia","Myanmar","Algeria","Malta","Uruguay","Cyprus","Guadeloupe"))

panels.name: Filtered SPF Failures by Location
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="<srccat>"
| parse xml "/record/report_metadata/org_name/text()" as org_name nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/source_ip/text()" as source_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/policy_evaluated/disposition/text()" as disposition_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/policy_evaluated/dkim/text()" as dkim_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/policy_evaluated/spf/text()" as spf_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/identifiers/header_from/text()" as header_from nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/dkim/domain/text()" as dkim_domain nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/dkim/result/text()" as dkim_domain_result nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/spf/domain/text()" as spf_domain nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/spf/result/text()" as spf_domain_result nodrop
| where spf_ip="fail" //and !(org_name="google.com")
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_name, region, country_cf from geo://location on ip=source_ip
| where !(country_name in ("Russian Federation","Viet Nam","Netherlands","China","Turkey","Singapore","Indonesia","India","Brazil","Iran","Czech Republic","Thailand","Korea (south)","Taiwan","Ukraine","Hong Kong","Chile","Hungary","Malaysia","Argentina","Colombia","Slovak Republic","Portugal","Latvia","Bangladesh","Philippines","Lithuania","Bulgaria","Estonia","Israel","Bosnia And Herzegovina","Liechtenstein","Serbia","South Africa","Kazakhstan","Pakistan","Slovenia","Panama","Greece","Tunisia","Kyrgyzstan","New Zealand","Mongolia","Uzbekistan","Iceland","United Arab Emirates","Nigeria","Mali","Venezuela","Costa Rica","Belarus","Croatia","Bhutan","Moldova","Morocco","El Salvador","Peru","Niger","Belize","Laos","Azerbaijan","Madagascar","Uganda","Nepal","Cambodia","Macedonia","Armenia","Egypt","Iraq","Mauritius","Qatar","Fiji","Georgia","Dominican Republic","Mozambique","Bahamas","Kenya","New Caledonia","Myanmar","Algeria","Malta","Uruguay","Cyprus","Guadeloupe"))

| count latitude, longitude //,header_from, dkim_domain, source_ip //,_timeslice
| order by _count
//| transpose row _timeslice column header_from

panels.name: DKIM Failures
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="<srccat>"
| parse xml "/record/report_metadata/org_name/text()" as org_name nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/source_ip/text()" as source_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/policy_evaluated/disposition/text()" as disposition_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/policy_evaluated/dkim/text()" as dkim_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/policy_evaluated/spf/text()" as spf_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/identifiers/header_from/text()" as header_from nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/dkim/domain/text()" as dkim_domain nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/dkim/result/text()" as dkim_domain_result nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/spf/domain/text()" as spf_domain nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/spf/result/text()" as spf_domain_result nodrop
| where dkim_domain_result="fail" //and !(org_name="google.com")
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_name, region, country_cf from geo://location on ip=source_ip
| where !(country_name in ("Russian Federation","Viet Nam","Netherlands","China","Turkey","Singapore","Indonesia","India","Brazil","Iran","Czech Republic","Thailand","Korea (south)","Taiwan","Ukraine","Hong Kong","Chile","Hungary","Malaysia","Argentina","Colombia","Slovak Republic","Portugal","Latvia","Bangladesh","Philippines","Lithuania","Bulgaria","Estonia","Israel","Bosnia And Herzegovina","Liechtenstein","Serbia","South Africa","Kazakhstan","Pakistan","Slovenia","Panama","Greece","Tunisia","Kyrgyzstan","New Zealand","Mongolia","Uzbekistan","Iceland","United Arab Emirates","Nigeria","Mali","Venezuela","Costa Rica","Belarus","Croatia","Bhutan","Moldova","Morocco","El Salvador","Peru","Niger","Belize","Laos","Azerbaijan","Madagascar","Uganda","Nepal","Cambodia","Macedonia","Armenia","Egypt","Iraq","Mauritius","Qatar","Fiji","Georgia","Dominican Republic","Mozambique","Bahamas","Kenya","New Caledonia","Myanmar","Algeria","Malta","Uruguay","Cyprus","Guadeloupe"))
//| timeslice 1d
| count header_from, dkim_domain, dkim_ip, dkim_domain_result, source_ip, country_name //,_timeslice
| order by _count
//| transpose row _timeslice column header_from

panels.name: DKIM Failures
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="<srccat>"
| parse xml "/record/report_metadata/org_name/text()" as org_name nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/source_ip/text()" as source_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/policy_evaluated/disposition/text()" as disposition_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/policy_evaluated/dkim/text()" as dkim_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/policy_evaluated/spf/text()" as spf_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/identifiers/header_from/text()" as header_from nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/dkim/domain/text()" as dkim_domain nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/dkim/result/text()" as dkim_domain_result nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/spf/domain/text()" as spf_domain nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/spf/result/text()" as spf_domain_result nodrop
| where dkim_domain_result="fail" or dkim_ip="fail"//and !(org_name="google.com")
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_name, region, country_cf from geo://location on ip=source_ip
| where !(country_name in ("Russian Federation","Viet Nam","Netherlands","China","Turkey","Singapore","Indonesia","India","Brazil","Iran","Czech Republic","Thailand","Korea (south)","Taiwan","Ukraine","Hong Kong","Chile","Hungary","Malaysia","Argentina","Colombia","Slovak Republic","Portugal","Latvia","Bangladesh","Philippines","Lithuania","Bulgaria","Estonia","Israel","Bosnia And Herzegovina","Liechtenstein","Serbia","South Africa","Kazakhstan","Pakistan","Slovenia","Panama","Greece","Tunisia","Kyrgyzstan","New Zealand","Mongolia","Uzbekistan","Iceland","United Arab Emirates","Nigeria","Mali","Venezuela","Costa Rica","Belarus","Croatia","Bhutan","Moldova","Morocco","El Salvador","Peru","Niger","Belize","Laos","Azerbaijan","Madagascar","Uganda","Nepal","Cambodia","Macedonia","Armenia","Egypt","Iraq","Mauritius","Qatar","Fiji","Georgia","Dominican Republic","Mozambique","Bahamas","Kenya","New Caledonia","Myanmar","Algeria","Malta","Uruguay","Cyprus","Guadeloupe"))
//| timeslice 1d
| count latitude, longitude //header_from, dkim_domain, dkim_ip, dkim_domain_result, source_ip //,_timeslice
//| order by _count
//| transpose row _timeslice column header_from

panels.name: Domain Detail Search
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="<srccat>"  and {{domain_uri}}
| parse xml "/record/report_metadata/org_name/text()" as org_name nodrop
| parse xml "/record/report_metadata/date_range/begin/text()" as report_begin_date nodrop
| parse xml "/record/report_metadata/date_range/end/text()" as report_end_date nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/source_ip/text()" as source_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/policy_evaluated/disposition/text()" as disposition_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/policy_evaluated/dkim/text()" as dkim_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/row/policy_evaluated/spf/text()" as spf_ip nodrop
| parse xml "/record/identifiers/header_from/text()" as header_from nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/dkim/domain/text()" as dkim_domain nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/dkim/result/text()" as dkim_domain_result nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/spf/domain/text()" as spf_domain nodrop
| parse xml "/record/auth_results/spf/result/text()" as spf_domain_result nodrop
//| formatDate(fromMillis(report_begin_date),"MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss") as rpt_begin
//| formatDate(fromMillis(report_end_date),"MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss") as rpt_end
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_name, region, country_cf from geo://location on ip=source_ip
//| where !(country_name in ("Russian Federation","Viet Nam","Netherlands","China","Turkey","Singapore","Indonesia","India","Brazil","Iran","Czech Republic","Thailand","Korea (south)","Taiwan","Ukraine","Hong Kong","Chile","Hungary","Malaysia","Argentina","Colombia","Slovak Republic","Portugal","Latvia","Bangladesh","Philippines","Lithuania","Bulgaria","Estonia","Israel","Bosnia And Herzegovina","Liechtenstein","Serbia","South Africa","Kazakhstan","Pakistan","Slovenia","Panama","Greece","Tunisia","Kyrgyzstan","New Zealand","Mongolia","Uzbekistan","Iceland","United Arab Emirates","Nigeria","Mali","Venezuela","Costa Rica","Belarus","Croatia","Bhutan","Moldova","Morocco","El Salvador","Peru","Niger","Belize","Laos","Azerbaijan","Madagascar","Uganda","Nepal","Cambodia","Macedonia","Armenia","Egypt","Iraq","Mauritius","Qatar","Fiji","Georgia","Dominican Republic","Mozambique","Bahamas","Kenya","New Caledonia","Myanmar","Algeria","Malta","Uruguay","Cyprus","Guadeloupe"))
| where spf_ip="fail" or spf_domain_result="fail" or dkim_ip="fail" or dkim_domain_result="fail" //and !(org_name="google.com")
//| timeslice 1d
| count source_ip, header_from, spf_domain, spf_ip, spf_domain_result, dkim_domain,dkim_ip,dkim_domain_result //,_timeslice
| order by _count
//| transpose row _timeslice column header_from
